LanguageData.ATB_ChemCapsule.label: Chemical Capsule
LanguageData.ATB_ChemCapsule.description: A small, dense capsule full of synthetic precursor chemicals ready for processing into neutroamine or chemfuel.
LanguageData.ATB_NutrientSolution.label: nutrient solution
LanguageData.ATB_NutrientSolution.description: A thick slurry of high protein and high calorie substances which has a vaguely honey-like consistency, albeit with a blander taste that is neither offensive nor sweet. This solution is unstabilized, and must be treated with chemical capsules to achieve its notoriously non-spoiling state.
LanguageData.ATB_NutritionBlock.label: nutrition block
LanguageData.ATB_NutritionBlock.description: A dense, nutrition rich block created by stabilizing nutrient solution with chemical capsules. Akin to a crumbly form of cheese, this substance will never expire and is full of essential nutrients for sustenance.
